item.description:
Reading spots are full, but you can still come out to socialize! Please RSVP even if you are not getting a reading so we can plan accordingly.

Enjoy an afternoon of relaxation and great conversation ($5). Plus... a spiritual energy reading, if you want ($20).

An energy reading is where you can ask about certain areas of your life E.g. Career, Relationships, family etc. Messages received during energy readings serve to clarify or guide you in areas of your life. Your reader, Mary Cheyne was the first runner up of World Champion of Public Speaking and has been doing energy work for over 10 years.

There will be coffee, tea and soft drinks (no alcohol), munchies and desserts.

Anyone can attend this meetup, but only 20 spots are available for private readings. When you RSVP please state if you would like a reading. Payment in cash is due upon arrival.

Cost to attend this event is: $5 (Free to sponsors)
Cost for a reading: $20
Please note that the reading fee is in addition to the $5 event cost and is limited the first 20 people to RSVP yes and write in the comment section: Yes to a reading.
item.name: Afternoon Social and Spiritual Readings
